question: 穴
sourceAnswer: hole/opening/perforation | pit/hollow/hole-(in-the-ground,-etc.) | burrow/den/lair/holt/hole | deficit/shortage/missing-person-(in-a-team,-meeting,-etc.) | vacancy/opening | flaw | well-kept-secret-place | upset-victory-(with-a-large-payoff) | pit-(of-a-theater) | hiding-place/hideout | underbelly-(of-society,-etc.)
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading you learned with the kanji is the same as the reading for this word. No <vocabulary>hole</vocabulary>s in your knowledge!
